FuncDef: The display call rate command displays the total call put-through rate for all types of users.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Applicable Environment
When you collect statistics about network operation quality, using the display call rate command can display the call put-through rate for various types of users.
The output of the display call rate command includes the number of calls, number of successful calls, and call put-through rate for various types of users.
Precautions
If a certain type of users is not configured on the device, the displayed statistics about the type of users are all 0, including the number of calls, number of successful calls, and call put-through rate.
